DOC.brief_summary: This trial investigate effect several dos FE 999049 Japanese woman undergo IVF/ICSI treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-response Trial Using FE 999049 Japanese Women Undergoing Vitro Fertilisation ( IVF ) / Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) Treatment
DOC.criteria: Women diagnose tubal infertility , unexplained infertility , infertility relate endometriosis stage I/II partner diagnose male factor infertility Women eligible IVF and/or ICSI treatment Women age 2039 year Women body mass index ( BMI ) 17.532.0 kg/m2 Women polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) associate anovulation , endometriosis stage III/IV Women history recurrent miscarriage Women contraindication control ovarian stimulation gonadotropin Women three control ovarian stimulation cycle
